column4: Does anyone knows how to open a pdf file by using the terminal (commands). Trying to get some practice with the command line terminal. Please help me
evince    .. or you can use 'gnome-open file'
you're welcome. gnome-open is handy for when you don't know what program to use to open a file
you're welcome.. here are some links you may find interesting :: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UsingTheTerminal  http://ubuntu-manual.org/
